author: Anna Hart
title: I was abandoned by my grey-gapper parents
text: Events I was abandoned by my grey-gapper parents Anna Hart's parents are going on a gap year in their sixties, finally giving her a taste of what it felt like for them when she jetted off to South East Asia at 24 My first thought was, “Where on earth is Vanuatu?” My second thought was, “You mean mum and dad are leaving us all alone? By Anna Hart
